response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for review. This product holds significant value to me, and I believe it could greatly benefit you as well. Given its worth to both parties, I propose a fair transaction of $11,000 for the product. I understand that you might find this valuable at $12,000 to you, but I hope we can come to an agreement that respects the value each party sees in the product while maximizing my earnings. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.", "product_price": 11000}
